title: RISE Study Recruitment Video
description: I was hired by the Primary Investigator of the RISE Study to create an informational recruitment video for parents interested in enrolling in the study. RISE is a partnership between the Center for Child and Family Health and the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. I was tasked with a short animation that would communicate both what the study entails and the benefits it offers for participants.

title: Therapy Practice Website
description: Behavioral Health Solutions is a Durham, NC based therapy practice that has provided mental health services for 20+ years. I was hired to design a comprehensive website from the ground up
